body.value:
DISCOVER MY MAIN SKILLS!

In this section you can find everything I am qualified for. You will be able to see a record of various qualities, as well as previous experiences of working in different environments, be it programming or design.

You will have a content of the experience that it has in the specific programs or skills, in the end it will be you who will have the last word!
